title: Eli the Minnow and The Coral Cave Adventure
description: The Coral Cave Adventure is the first book of the Eli the Minnow series, and it encourages our children to never give up regardless of the circumstance. In this story, all the friends get trapped in a cave! After watching multiple friends try to get out but failing, Eli’s confident determination to get his friends to safety pushes him to find a way out. Don’t let Eli’s size fool you! He is a very determined and dedicated little minnow, and he always gives it his all! Come join Eli and all his friends in their exciting adventure at Coral Cave Park!Visit Eli now at: www.EliTheMinnow.com
author: David L. Sterling
